itemDescription: British athlete, and rugby league footballer and administrator

wikipedia_page.main: Abagi 'Abi' Bienose Ekoku (born 13 April 1966) is a male former track and field athlete in both Discus and Shot put, as well as a former professional rugby league footballer.

response: * Abi Ekoku, former GB Lions rugby league manager, British discus champion and Bradford Bulls, London Broncos and Halifax winger

link_mentions.page: West London Institute of Higher Education
response: * Abi Ekoku CEO and Rugby League player, Bradford Bulls; Discus thrower, UK Champion, GB/England – European Championships/Commonwealth Games
* Abi Ekoku - Athlete and Rugby player
*Round 8: Paul Anderson and Abi Ekoku scored their 1st tries for the Bulls.
